title: Blacklist management
subtitle: All deals sent to blacklisted addresses are rejected

onCheckAddressValidity.invalidFormat: {{address}} is not a valid Filecoin address
onCheckAddressValidity.unsupportedType: {{address}} address type is not supported, use SECP256K1, ID or BLS address
onCheckAddressValidity.default: {{address}} cannot be added, please try later or contact CIDgravity

onCheckBlacklisted.isShortAddress: {{address}} resolves in {{resolved}} which is already blacklisted

error.onBlacklistAddress: {{address}} cannot be blacklisted, please try later or contact CIDgravity
error.onWhitelistAddress: Something wrong while whitelisting this address
error.onAddressGenericError: Something wrong while trying to blacklist this address

success.onBlacklistAddress: All deals from this address are now rejected!
success.onWhitelistAddress: Address whitelisted, deals will now go through rules engine!
